org.zollty.util.resource

类 FileSystemContextResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zollty.util.resource.AbstractResource
      • org.zollty.util.resource.FileSystemResource
        • org.zollty.util.resource.FileSystemContextResource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ContextResource, InputStreamSource, Resource, WritableResource

    public class FileSystemContextResource
extends FileSystemResource
implements ContextResource
    FileSystemResource that explicitly expresses a context-relative path through implementing the ContextResource interface.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Return the path within the enclosing 'context'.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPathWithinContext

        public String getPathWithinContext()
        从接口复制的说明: ContextResource
        Return the path within the enclosing 'context'.

        This is typically path relative to a context-specific root directory, e.g. a ServletContext root or a PortletContext root.

        指定者:
        getPathWithinContext 在接口中 ContextResource
